title: Team owner confirms EF Education-TIBCO-SVB will fold in 2024 after sponsor crisis
content:
'I leave the WorldTour very proud, and very grateful.' Linda Jackson calls time on the long-running US team she established in 2007.

Read the full article at Team owner confirms EF Education-TIBCO-SVB will fold in 2024 after sponsor crisis on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
